text: Nizhnetroitsky () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Nizhnetroitsky Selsoviet, Tuymazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 4,008 as of 2010. There are 12 streets. == Geography == It is located 33 km from Tuymazy. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tuymazinsky District
title: Nizhnetroitsky
